price: Ya`qūb  berkata, "Hanya dirimu sendirilah yang memandang baik perbuatan (yang buruk) itu.  Maka kesabaran yang baik itulah (kesabaranku).  Mudah-mudahan Allah mendatangkan mereka semuanya kepadaku; sesungguhnya Dia-lah Yang Maha Mengetahui lagi Maha Bijaksana".
arabic: قَالَ بَلۡ سَوَّلَتۡ لَكُمۡ أَنفُسُكُمۡ أَمۡرٗاۖ فَصَبۡرٞ جَمِيلٌۖ عَسَى ٱللَّهُ أَن يَأۡتِيَنِي بِهِمۡ جَمِيعًاۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amran faṣabrun jamīlun ʿasā al-lahu an yatiyanī bihim jamīʿan innahu huwa al-ʿalīmu al-ḥakīmu
